name: Sledgehammer I.T.
description:
Destruction En Masse! Sick of your job in I.T? Just take a Sledgehammer to Everything! Earn points by destroying walls, desks computers, servers, and more! But beware, You will encounter resistance on your ruinous crusade! 

Go up the elevator into the seemingly endless maze of an office, and WREAK HAVOC ON EVERYTHING! 90% of the environment is completely DESTRUCTIBLE!

WASD to move, Left Shift to run, Left Control to crouch, and Left click to swing that hammer of cataclysmic power!

(Sorry that only the Windows Downloadable version is available; I didn't have the foresight to download the webgl output option for unity.)

Made in 72 hours for the Score Space Jam #5 June 22-24, 2019
